title: Best baked potato soup
ingredients: ['12 rashers streaky bacon', '150g butter or margarine', '85g plain flour', '1.75 litres milk', '4 large potatoes, baked, peeled and cubed', '4 spring onions, chopped', '140g Cheddar cheese, grated', '250ml soured cream', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper']
